name: smart-stack
description: We want Smart Cards to be the go to web application for anyone who is looking to ace their technical coding interview. We are looking to design an interactive & easy to use user interface where the user can pick which topic they want to learn about and they will be presented with popular interview questions for that topic

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm start" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
